init.characterSays: Welcome to Ascension merchant. Please stay out of trouble and bother me as little as possible.

who_are_you.characterSays: I am Audric the King of Coin. All merchant guild leaders report directly to me.

responses.text: How did you become King of Coin?

how_king.characterSays: I own the East Coast Shipping Company. Common haggling on the street will only get you so far.

responses.text: How can I become the King of Coin?

become_king.characterSays: Don't be ridiculous. Is that a serious question?

responses.text: Yes, I really want to know
Just tell me you pompous donkey

insist_become_king.characterSays: On the Last Saturday of Winter, merchants travel to Ascension to vote on the King of Coin.

responses.text: How do I run for King of Coin?

how_to_run.characterSays: The application fee is five hundred gold coins. Then you'll have to best me in a debate in front of the guild.

responses.text: How do I get 500 gold coins?
Easy. I'll be King of Coin soon.

how_to_get_gold.characterSays: That's not my problem. Now please be on your way, I am a busy man.

ask_debate.characterSays: I'm not here to hold your hand on replacing me. Buy something or go bother someone else.

easy.characterSays: Sure. Good luck. Now go bother somebody else.
